products.title: Artisan Chartreuse Roman Blind
products.description: The artisan range are beautifully made blinds which give a little kick to any room. It can match any wallpaper in the room even at this astonishing price. This yellow roman blind is the perfect choice to add a splash of colour to any room in your home. Product id: db-arom0654 fabric colour: chartreuse material: 84% polyester 16% cotton control type: sidewinder chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes artisan chartreuse roman blind in yellow.

products.title: Artisan Mauve Roman Blind
products.description: The artisan range are beautifully made blinds which give a little kick to any room. It can match any wallpaper in the room even at this astonishing price. This textured purple roman blind is the perfect solution to add colour to anyroom in your home. Product id: db-arom0815 fabric colour: mauve material: 84% polyester 16% cotton headrail: white metal headrail control type: sidewinder chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes artisan mauve roman blind in purple.

products.title: Artisan Denim
products.description: Min width: 350mm max width: 2500mm min drop: 400mm max drop: 2500mm fabric composition: 84% polyester / 16% cotton guarantee: 12 months controls: sidewinder control. Fabric lining: fully lined as standard, blackout and interlining available. Fixings: fixing brackets included. Headrail: robust aluminium headrail, 40mm wide x 40mm deep. Finish: fabric attached to headrail with velcro. Buy made to measure artisan denim deluxe roman blinds from soeasy blinds.
